title: 92/381/EEC: Commission Decision of 3 July 1992 establishing the status of a region of the United Kingdom as regards Newcastle disease
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 3 July 1992  establishing the status of a region of the United Kingdom as regards Newcastle disease  (92/381/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Northern Ireland fulfils the criteria fixed by Article 12 (2) of Directive 90/539/EEC.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 3 July 1992. For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 303, 31. 10. 1990, p. 6. (2) OJ No L 268, 24. 9. 1991, p. 56.
